'Squirrel Hill' is a residential neighborhood in the east end of Pittsburgh,
Pennsylvania, United States. The city officially divides it into two
neighborhoods, 'Squirrel Hill North' and 'Squirrel Hill South', but it is almost
universally treated as a single neighborhood.
categories: Jewish communities in the United States
Jews and Judaism in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
